/* Miss America and Private Parts film (1995â1997) */ IMDb can't be used for reference, only as EL

IMDB, and particularly its bios, cannot be used as a reference, only as an EL. Everything there is supposed to come from an outside source, so cite the outside source. He's written an autobiography, for example.
